source.name: Open Colorado
source.description: OpenColorado in collaboration with the Colorado Information Marketplace provides a data sharing platform that allows Colorado government organizations to make public data available and accessible to all Colorado constituents.  OpenColorado works closely with counties and municipalities whereas the Colorado Information Marketplace focuses on state data.
